name: Pico Autochess
description:
This is an autobattler game like Teamfight Tactics, DOTA Autochess, or Super Auto Pets. I've tried to pack a lot into this pico-8 cart - 26 heroes with unique abilities, 3 game modes.

HELP/INFO

Buy heroes (3 gold each). Your team size is limited but increases each round.

Reroll the shop for 1 gold.

Money doesn't save between rounds, but the shop cards do.

If you buy a duplicate hero, it will merge and gain +1 EXP. Enough EXP makes it level up, improving its stats.

  • Level 2: 1 EXP
  • Level 3: 3 EXP
  • Level 4: 6 EXP

If you press UP in the shop screen, you can move heroes around and view info about each hero.

For now you fight against random AI-generated teams, but in the future you will fight against other players' teams!

SOME HEROES
